t: Criticism of Amazon - Wikipedia
s: 1 week ago - The company uses data from the marketplace which is unavailable to other retailers in that marketplace to determine which products to produce in-house and at what price point. Amazon markets products under AmazonBasics, Lark & Ro, and other private-label brands.
